title: Arturia Spark VDM v1.7.2-R2R [deepstatus]
description:
Arturia Spark VDM v1.7.2





Arturia's Spark Vintage Drum Machines (VDM) software is a gotta-have addition to your rhythm arsenal. What's better than a legendary analog drum machine? How about 30 of them? That's what you get with Arturia's Spark VDM. This software gives you the best-of-the best, including the iconic Roland TR-808, TR-707, TR-909, and CR-78, the Korg KPR-77, the LinnDrum, the Yamaha RX5, the Maestro Rhythm King MKII, and more! You also get an intuitive, easy-to-program interface and a dedicated mixer with 14 great-sounding effects. Load up on classic vintage drum machines with Arturia's Spark Vintage Drum Machines.





         Arturia Spark Vintage Drum Machines Software at a Glance:

   Easy to program
   Top-shelf effects
   Use Spark VDM live


Easy to program
Arturia's Spark Vintage Drum Machines are bonehead-simple to use. With patterns that are expandable to 32, 48, and 64 stepa and a 16-step sequencer inspired by Roland's original TR-series, programming tracks in Spark Vintage Drum Machines is a cinch.

Top-shelf effects
Arturia's Spark Vintage Drum Machines includes 14 high-quality effects, including a multiband compressor, reverb, bit crusher, multiband EQ, chorus, delay, distortion, phaser, plate reverb, destroyer, flanger, space pan, limiter, sub generator.

Use Spark VDM live
Spark VDM offers the same exact live features as its older brother, Spark Creative Drum machine. You get an intuitive XY Pad that gives you real-time slicing and filtering, so you can effortlessly create awesome breaks. You also get three types of filters (lowpass, highpass, and bandpass), plus an advanced looper, that lets you divide loop size and move looping position simultaneously! Use this cool feature for introducing stutter dynamics into your music. Combine it with the XY Pad to send your audience into another dimension.





            Arturia Spark Vintage Drum Machines Software Features:

   30 legendary drum machines in 1 easy-to-use software package
   Intuitive interface
   Easy programing
   Built-in mixer
   High-quality effects
   Great live feature set (identical to the Spark Creative Drum machine)
   PC, RTAS, VST3



     
                                  Specification

Software Type Rhythm virtual instrument
Supported Computer Format PC
Supported Plug-In Formats PC, RTAS, VST3
Hardware Requirements - PC PC/Windows: 2 GB RAM; 2 GHz CPU
OS Requirements - PC Windows: XP/Vista/Seven





                                INSTALLATION:


       UnRaR.

Kawa-eLicenser v1.0.1

1.Kawa-eLicenser_Install.exe
 The installer of our emulator (x86/x64).
 Just run and install.

2.Kawa-eLicenser_Patch.exe
 This patch makes apps to load our emu instead of the official one.
 Generally *.exe, *.dll, *.vst3, *.dpm should be patched.


Arturia.Spark.VDM.v1.7-R2R

1.Install the software with setup.exe.
2.Copy Library dir to your HDD.
3.Run our Libary Placer included in Libary dir.

Files are patched only to load our emulator.
